      • asString

        public static <I> TypeConverter<I,java.lang.String> asString(TypeAdapterRegistry typeAdapters)
        Convert the value in type I to String using TypeAdapter registry
        Type Parameters:
        I - input type
        Parameters:
        typeAdapters - type adapter registry
        Returns:
        type converter that returns String representation of the value, null when the value is null, type converter throws IllegalStateException when no type adapters accepts to convert value.

      • fromString

        public static <O,T extends DslField<O> & FieldInfo> TypeConverter<java.lang.String,O> fromString(T fieldInfo,
                                                                                                 TypeAdapterRegistry typeAdapters)
        Convert String to I using TypeAdapter registry
        Type Parameters:
        O - output type
        T - field type to lookup the type adapter
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - field of the
        typeAdapters - type adapter registry
        Returns:
        type converter that returns the object value from String representation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no type adapter is found for the given field

        public static <I,O> TypeConverter<I,O> converter(java.util.function.Function<I,O> converter,
                                                 O nullCase,
                                                 java.lang.String description)
        1-to-1 converter with null case. Converter returns the nullCase value when the input is null.
        Type Parameters:
        I - input type
        O - output type
        Parameters:
        converter - converter function
        nullCase - value to return when the input is null

                                                         O nullCase,
                                                         java.lang.String description)

        Type Parameters:
        I - first input type
        J - second input type
        O - output type
        Parameters:
        converter - converter function
        nullCase - value to return when inputs are null

      • biConverter

        public static <I,J,O> BiTypeConverter<I,J,O> biConverter(java.util.function.BiFunction<I,J,O> converter,
                                                         I nullIn,
                                                         J nullIn2,
                                                         java.lang.String description)
        2-to-1 converter with compensation values for null inputs. Converter function will receive the corresponding nullIn value when the input is null.
        Type Parameters:
        I - first input type
        J - second input type
        O - output type
        Parameters:
        converter - converter function
        nullIn - compensation value for first input
        nullIn2 - compensation value for second input
        description - text description
        Returns:
        type converter
